parameters.name: Confirm
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to release the next batch. Valid values:

*   true: releases the next batch.
*   false: does not release the next batch.

parameters.name: PipelineId
parameters.description: The ID of the change process. You can call the GetChangeOrderInfo operation to query the ID of the change process that corresponds to a specific batch. For more information, see [GetChangeOrderInfo](~~62072~~).
